featureType.name: Cadastre of contaminated sites on civil aerodromes (CCS FOCA)
featureType.title: Cadastre of contaminated sites on civil aerodromes (CCS FOCA)
featureType.abstract: Public register of contaminated sites within the perimeter of civil aerodromes. This includes information about the location, type and quantity of waste, the period of deposition, as well as conducted studies and measures. The following types of sites can be distinguished: operating site, accident site and deposition site.

keywords.string: Conservation and archiving planning AAP - Confederation
